revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=RPF |model=Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4 |revision=Lite (CM4001000) |asin=B0B6VKYF58 |newegg=9SIAU62J2G8954 |manuf_country=UK |is_manuf=No |price=30 |est_release_date=08/2020 |type=SoM |pwr_v=5 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM2711 |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4F8E3S4HDMGCL |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54210PE |lan_speed=1GbE |addl_chips=5 Output Universal PMIC;MaxLinear (Exar);MxL7704;;1; }} {{TagLine|Compute Module 4 Lite}} :[https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/compute-module-4/?variant=raspberry-pi-cm4001000 Product page]
"RPI-CM4Lite-R1-3", "Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4" and :"Made in the UK" are silkscreened on module top.
===Links=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/10/19/raspberry-pi-cm4-cm4lite-modules/ ''Raspberry Pi CM4 and CM4Lite Modules Launched'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/raspberry-pi-cm4-launches-with-smaller-footprint-quad-a72-cpu-and-optional-wifi/''Raspberry Pi CM4 launches with smaller footprint'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2711 @1.5GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-72) *GPU: [[Broadcom]] VideoCore VI @500MHz :OpenGL ES 3.1, Vulkan 1.0, :H.265 (HEVC) (up to 4Kp60 decode), :H.264 (up to 1080p60 decode, 1080p30 encode) *Memory: 1GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port via connectors *Power Source: 5V via connectors
===Models=== *[[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 3]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM2837 • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/compute-module-3/ PPage] :• [[Waveshare CM-IO-POE-BOX]] *[[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 3 Lite]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM2837 :• [[ClockworkPi Core A-06]] • [[ClockworkPi Core R-01]] *[[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 3+]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM2837 • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/compute-module-3-plus/ PPage] *[[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 3+ Lite]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM2837 *[[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM2711 • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/compute-module-4/ PPage] *[[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4 Lite]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM2711 *[[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4S]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM2711 • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/compute-module-4s/ PPage]
==Images== <gallery> File:Raspberry Pi CM4 Lite (CM4001000) Top.jpeg|SoM Top File:Raspberry Pi CM4 Lite (CM4001000) Bottom.jpeg|SoM Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
